name: Space Station: Alpha Remastered
description:
!!Very much still in development!! Space Station: Alpha, but remastered with better graphics and new functionality. New builds will be put up when complete, should incorporate new functionality when done.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • X to selection option, toggle lighting on/off
  • Z to open instructions, return to menu

Planned features:

  • 3+ related scenarios
  • Randomised map layout
  • Daily run challenge
  • Atmospheric audio / SFX

Original:
